description:
In this version, I use 'Js" to add some animation to the code as if someone is typing the code to show time and greet.

Modified according to bickmanII.

If anyone want to know how this works, just look into the download document which maybe located in "steamapps\workshop\content\431960\1938225265", all the source code is here, you can check it with any text editor.
title: Code wallpaper
